ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Decking out my Enchanter
ygData.msgSnippet: At your level you should be able to afford a Flowing Black Robe. Also, the staff of writhing is about the opposite of what you need. Charisma is the LAST thing
ygData.messageBody:
At your level you should be able to afford a Flowing Black Robe.

Also, the staff of writhing is about the opposite of what you need. Charisma
is the LAST thing you need to have reduced by items.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Melinda [SMTP:warnock@...]
> Sent: Friday, June 09, 2000 2:20 PM
> To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Decking out my Enchanter
>
> Ive been searching everlore and etc to see what was the best robe and
> weapon for my enchanter. This is basically an opinion taking email.
>
> Im lvl 21, hi elf ench.. Currently Im wearing the gold robe from erudin
> and a nice lvl 50 mage gave me a staff of writhing.
>
> Im also interested in any opinions on other good items for enchanters.
>
> Please let me know,
>
> Thanks
> Calistaah
> 21st Season
> Veeshan Svr
